baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's total SDQ difficulties at 1-month follow-up (Endline 1).
baseline_groups.notes: Primary claim of the paper. SDQ Total Difficulties is the sum of 4 subscales (emotion, conduct, hyperactivity, peer). Most robustness checks target this baseline.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's total SDQ difficulties at 1-year follow-up (Endline 2).
baseline_groups.notes: Paper finds null effects at E2 (effect fadeout). This is a distinct claim from E1.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's emotional symptoms (SDQ subscale) at Endline 1.
baseline_groups.notes: SDQ Emotional Symptoms subscale. Paper finds null effects on this subscale.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's conduct problems (SDQ subscale) at Endline 1.
baseline_groups.notes: SDQ Conduct Problems subscale. Paper finds significant negative effect.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's hyperactivity/inattention (SDQ subscale) at Endline 1.
baseline_groups.notes: SDQ Hyperactivity/Inattention subscale. Paper finds significant negative effect.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's peer problems (SDQ subscale) at Endline 1.
baseline_groups.notes: SDQ Peer Problems subscale. Paper finds null effects on this subscale.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's emotional symptoms (SDQ subscale) at Endline 2.
baseline_groups.notes: E2 subscale baseline. No robustness specs target this baseline specifically.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's conduct problems (SDQ subscale) at Endline 2.
baseline_groups.notes: E2 subscale baseline. No robustness specs target this baseline specifically.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's hyperactivity/inattention (SDQ subscale) at Endline 2.
baseline_groups.notes: E2 subscale baseline. No robustness specs target this baseline specifically.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Telementoring reduces children's peer problems (SDQ subscale) at Endline 2.
baseline_groups.notes: E2 subscale baseline. No robustness specs target this baseline specifically.

global_notes: This paper has 10 baselines covering 5 SDQ outcomes x 2 endlines. The primary claim is G1 (total difficulties at E1). Most robustness checks (42 specs) target G1. Six robustness specs target G2 (total difficulties at E2). Twelve subscale robustness specs target G3-G6. The E2 subscale baselines (G7-G10) have no corresponding robustness specs and exist as standalone baselines. Two placebo specs test pre-treatment outcomes.
